Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
